multiple.question: Which is NOT a common feature of life on Earth?

answers.answer: All life is made of cells.
All life has different genetic codes.
All life interacts with other organisms.

multiple.question: Evolution is the Big Idea that will tie all of the other content areas of AP Biology together.
Which of the following is the best definition of evolution?

answers.answer: A change in genetic make up of individuals over time
A change in the genetic make up of a population over time

scene.matchingInstructions: Match the items on the left to the correct areas on the right.
scene.instructions: When you are done, check your results by clicking 'Check Answers.'

multiple.question: What property does all life have in common?

answers.answer: A tree that lives for many years.
A pet that has been spayed or neutered.
A bachelor that has never married or had children.
A dandelion plant in your lawn that produces many seeds each year.

multiple.question: Which answer is NOT a topic that fits under Big Idea 1?

answers.answer: How birds originated from dinosaur-like ancestors.

multiple.question: Where do we find life on planet Earth?
Which of the following is a topic or question that can be studied under Big Idea 1?

answers.answer: Why life is based on silicon molecules.
How life has changed over time.
How matter is converted into energy.
